mapper.insert: insert into brand (name, created_date, sort, logo, description, url) values (#{name}, #{createdDate}, #{sort}, #{logo}, #{description}, #{url})
mapper.update: update brand set name = #{name}, created_date = #{createdDate}, sort = #{sort}, logo = #{logo}, description = #{description}, url = #{url} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, created_date, sort, logo, description, url from brand
